definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: When Aaron and all the Israelites saw Moses, hisface was radiant, and they were afraid to come near him.
sentences.chinese: 亚伦和以色列众人看见摩西的面皮发光就怕挨近他。

sentences.english: Place a rounded tablespoonful of filling in lower right corner of strip.
sentences.chinese: 舀满满一汤匙的馅倒在面皮的右下角处。

sentences.english: The production of flour dough is formed.
sentences.chinese: 面皮是用面粉制作而成的。

sentences.english: Back home I knock out the pastry and do a bit of hasty tidying-up.
sentences.chinese: 回到家后，我连忙檊面皮，匆匆忙忙地收拾了一下。

sentences.english: Mini-skirts are ruffled and flirty in denim or suede with laser-cut detailing.
sentences.chinese: 迷你短裙是娇媚的牛仔布或有精致激光雕刻绒面皮。

sentences.english: I try to make it healthier with a whole grain crust.
sentences.chinese: 我试着使用全谷物的面皮，这样使它更加有益健康。

sentences.english: If you kill a guy step back hide and wait.
sentences.chinese: 如果你杀害人步后面皮并且等待。

sentences.english: The paper-thin crust serves as the wrapper of the stuffing.
sentences.chinese: 纸一般的面皮是用来包那些馅儿的。

sentences.english: The crust was made of high-quality starch.
sentences.chinese: 面皮是用上好的淀粉做成的。

sentences.english: And when Aaron and all the children of Israel saw Moses， behold， the skin of his face shone； and they were afraid to come nigh him.
sentences.chinese: 亚伦和以色列众人看见摩西的面皮发光就怕挨近他。

sentences.english: He had to spend 8 hours rolling out a lump of dough.
sentences.chinese: 仅制面皮这工序，便要花上八个小时。

sentences.english: Light skin is still a snake skin pattern?
